title: Tech Stack
description: Utilizes Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy for ML; Streamlit for UI; joblib for model serialization.

title: How It Works
description: User inputs job title, education, and experience. Model predicts expected salary using trained regression model.

title: Features
description: Real-time salary prediction, resume tips, visual job insights, and clean single-page design.

title: Model Training
description: Trained on a cleaned employer salary dataset using Linear Regression and Scikit-learn pipeline.

title: Resume Tips
description: Personalized career and resume tips provided based on job title and experience.
